Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Women's Issues

Items.Title: Oversight - Plans to renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Plans to renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs (V.A.) to completely renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center to provide a full-service V.A. hospital with an emergency room, a primary and extended care facility for female veterans, and a comprehensive treatment facility with domiciliary for homeless veterans.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Department of Veterans Affairs (V.A.) to completely renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Women's Issues
Oversight - Plans to renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Plans to renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs (V.A.) to completely renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center to provide a full-service V.A. hospital with an emergency room, a primary and extended care facility for female veterans, and a comprehensive treatment facility with domiciliary for homeless veterans.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Department of Veterans Affairs (V.A.) to completely renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center.
